QuestData.Title: A Heavy Burden
QuestData.Description:
With Ashildir's judgment, your final trial is complete.
But even Valhallas can wait, for now we must eat! Being dead works up quite an appetite.
Come now, bring some of that fish to roast over the fire. It is far too heavy for me to carry.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the fish from Havi's Fish Barrel and skewer it on the spear above the fire.
QuestData.RewardText: It is clear that your cooking prowess is only matched by your might in combat. $B$BNow, on full bellies, we ride to Valhallas!

Objectives.Objective: Carry Havi's fish to the fire
